bf1b8ef0-058f-4547-9608-8cc2e31d4fd8.name: Claws, Blunt (Hands)
bf1b8ef0-058f-4547-9608-8cc2e31d4fd8.notes: Only pay for hands or feet, not both

76aa14f2-a70a-4f6c-a42b-0d2555a30af9.name: Combat Reflexes
76aa14f2-a70a-4f6c-a42b-0d2555a30af9.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

e3d0a798-2db2-45cf-98ca-9601eb7890dc.name: Fit
e3d0a798-2db2-45cf-98ca-9601eb7890dc.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

ab4d93f4-374a-4079-8f6c-8f8c407589cd.name: Fit, Very
ab4d93f4-374a-4079-8f6c-8f8c407589cd.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

b13101b8-5a89-4c14-a039-8d50770868b7.name: High Pain Threshold
b13101b8-5a89-4c14-a039-8d50770868b7.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

fbcb77ed-692f-45be-96c2-d018abd5b2df.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

f90a4356-dde1-457e-b14a-c187a61a2700.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

95a000a1-f53b-4a1e-9b36-40b95599a443.name: Legal Enforcement Powers (@Federal or Secret Service@)

e29934d3-f994-4ce4-b00e-f3cdd6f677cc.name: Wise Master
e29934d3-f994-4ce4-b00e-f3cdd6f677cc.notes: Choose 20 points. You can add your template's IQ-, Will-, or Per-based skills.

0fce73da-3b84-42a5-80e1-d46e710f30c6.name: Luck, Extraordinary
0fce73da-3b84-42a5-80e1-d46e710f30c6.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play

06faff9c-d470-4331-8413-6fe492a19dee.name: Luck
06faff9c-d470-4331-8413-6fe492a19dee.notes: Usable once per hour of play

bae6e801-bb91-483c-82fb-b0ebc5d50a51.name: Chummy
bae6e801-bb91-483c-82fb-b0ebc5d50a51.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

6809614e-40f1-44d9-a553-4c33d8fda587.name: Obsession
6809614e-40f1-44d9-a553-4c33d8fda587.notes: @Beat a specific rival or win a specific tournament@

7cae5ecf-5810-4e70-bfd9-d9648d64529a.name: Martial Arts Perks
7cae5ecf-5810-4e70-bfd9-d9648d64529a.notes: Distribute 15 points between these and Martial Arts Skills.

671ace82-7a7f-49f9-9179-27a53dbf559a.name: Cowpoker
671ace82-7a7f-49f9-9179-27a53dbf559a.notes: Must wear pointy-toed boots. Unarmed skill bonuses apply.

7fa66cac-41a2-4dc2-8b37-9a6494bfffbc.name: Deadly Pose
7fa66cac-41a2-4dc2-8b37-9a6494bfffbc.notes: Free Intimidation attempt upon takedown. -5 in combat. +2 for knockout. +5 for fatality.

c4f610e3-ba5a-48ff-9625-a59485c15c50.name: Finishing Move (@Attack@)
c4f610e3-ba5a-48ff-9625-a59485c15c50.notes: +1 per die of damage, but only upon disabled foes.

34858664-26a4-4935-825a-83159f6238fb.name: Focused Fury
34858664-26a4-4935-825a-83159f6238fb.notes: Combine Mighty Blows and All Out Attack

b8ab99a7-a288-4098-ac9c-b23c06f71498.name: Trademark Move
b8ab99a7-a288-4098-ac9c-b23c06f71498.notes: +1 to @One turn of detailed combat actions@

df907959-d728-417b-8005-3caa7a1c17fe.name: Choose 18 points
df907959-d728-417b-8005-3caa7a1c17fe.notes: Either two or six points may be used to level-up one of these skills.

8e70a24d-0de9-4bf8-b434-19e32b3c8718.name: Intelligence
8e70a24d-0de9-4bf8-b434-19e32b3c8718.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

f8888e7f-4bfb-45fd-a303-441dcb2cebd0.name: Choose 16 points
f8888e7f-4bfb-45fd-a303-441dcb2cebd0.notes: Either two or six of those points may be used to increase one of these skills by one or two levels.

0421a69b-f850-46ac-9bdb-0fe7ceed4224.name: Choose 18 points
0421a69b-f850-46ac-9bdb-0fe7ceed4224.notes: Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

6505abba-7231-4611-8a80-cb092f862781.name: Security
6505abba-7231-4611-8a80-cb092f862781.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

ede192ce-2041-49da-b129-0028de5c5b16.name: Wise Master
ede192ce-2041-49da-b129-0028de5c5b16.notes: 20 points in your template's IQ-, Will-, or Per-based skills.

fe6c3d48-3621-4712-9636-e31f1bfbbc98.name: Martial Arts Skills
fe6c3d48-3621-4712-9636-e31f1bfbbc98.notes: Distribute 15 points between these and Martial Arts Perks.

2c7a8114-d2cb-46cf-a40e-cc86cdf87748.name: Judo
2c7a8114-d2cb-46cf-a40e-cc86cdf87748.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.

1ddaa5ea-b769-40b8-a3c0-f4d6100f9591.name: Choose five
1ddaa5ea-b769-40b8-a3c0-f4d6100f9591.notes: Or four, and raise one by a level.
